navigation.paulWillContact: Paul will contact you to arrange payment

hero.title: Welcome to Our Virtual Workshop
hero.subtitle: Handcrafted bowed string instruments from the heart of Transylvania, where tradition meets exceptional craftsmanship.
hero.quote: We are Paul and Ecaterina Simon, and we are happy to welcome you to our site. From our little workshop in Reghin, known as "The City of Violins," we create instruments that resonate with musicians worldwide.

instruments.title: Our Craft
instruments.subtitle: Explore our four families of handcrafted string instruments. Each one tells a story of tradition, craftsmanship, and dedication.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: A tradition of excellence from Reghin, Transylvania

heritage.title: Master Craftsmanship
heritage.description: Since 2001, we've been perfecting the art of string instrument making, learning from the best traditions of Reghin.

materials.title: Premium Materials
materials.description: We carefully select and naturally cure the finest tonewoods, ensuring exceptional resonance in every instrument.

clientele.title: International Clientele
clientele.description: Our instruments are appreciated by musicians from France, Belgium, Spain, Germany, Japan, Taiwan, and beyond.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from musicians who have chosen our instruments

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our instruments and services
faq.contactPrompt: Can't find what you're looking for?

purchase.question: How can I purchase an instrument?
purchase.answer: You can browse our available instruments in the Shop section. Each instrument page has detailed information, photos, and audio samples. To purchase, simply add the instrument to your cart and proceed to checkout, or contact us directly for a personalized consultation.

shipping.question: How does delivery work?
shipping.answer: Delivery and insurance are included in the price. We offer door-to-door service: your instrument is picked up from our atelier in Reghin and delivered directly to your address. Depending on your location, delivery may be via air cargo or ground transport. We've successfully delivered to clients in France, Belgium, Spain, Germany, Japan, Taiwan, and many other countries worldwide. Every instrument is professionally packed with climate protection and fully insured throughout the journey.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 14-day return policy for instruments in their original condition. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return the instrument for a full refund minus shipping costs. Custom orders may have different terms.

certificate.question: Do instruments come with a certificate of authenticity?
certificate.answer: Yes, every instrument we create comes with a signed certificate of authenticity that includes details about the materials used, construction date, and our workshop guarantee.

care.question: How should I care for my instrument?
care.answer: We recommend keeping your instrument in a case when not in use, maintaining proper humidity levels (40-60%), and having it professionally set up annually. We include detailed care instructions with every purchase.

custom.question: Can I order a custom instrument?
custom.answer: We welcome custom orders. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements, preferences for wood selection, varnish color, and any other customizations you'd like. Custom instruments typically take 3-6 months to complete.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through our secure Stripe payment system. For larger purchases, we can also arrange bank transfers or payment plans.

packaging.question: How are instruments packaged for delivery?
packaging.answer: Each instrument is carefully wrapped in protective materials, placed in a hard case (included with purchase), and then packed in a custom shipping box with additional padding. We use climate-controlled packaging to protect your instrument throughout its journey from our atelier to your door.

inquiry.personalResponseDesc: Paul or Ecaterina Simon will personally review your inquiry and respond with detailed information about the instruments you're interested in.
inquiry.consultationAvailableDesc: We can arrange a phone or video call to discuss your needs and help you find the perfect instrument.

order.shippingTrackingDesc: Your instrument will be carefully packaged at our atelier and delivered door-to-door to your address. Delivery and full insurance are included. You'll receive tracking details once your instrument is on its way.
